details.claim_text: The trailer for Elvish Yadav's "AUKAAT KE BAHAR" has been released, creating immense anticipation for its December 3rd launch.
details.claim_context: The post announces the release of the trailer for "AUKAAT KE BAHAR," stating that both the teaser and trailer have been highly impactful, and expresses extreme impatience for the main release on December 3rd. It highlights Elvish Yadav and the #ElvishArmy.
